description: This KPI calculates the number of cases that have been generated by a purchase requisition divided by all cases.
name: Purchase Requisition Ratio
template:
100*AVG(
CASE  
    WHEN PU_COUNT("EKPO", "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_<%=language%>", "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_<%=language%>" = '<%=create_purchase_requisition_activity%>' )> 0
    THEN 1.0
    ELSE 0.0
END)

description: This KPI calculates the number of cases that have been generated by a purchase requisition.
name: Purchase Requisitions
template:
SUM(
CASE  
    WHEN PU_COUNT("EKPO", "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_<%=language%>", "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_<%=language%>" = '<%=create_purchase_requisition_activity%>' )> 0
    THEN 1.0
    ELSE 0.0
END)

description: This indicator shows whether the case has a Purchase Requisition.
name: Purchase Requisitions Indicator
template:
CASE 
  WHEN PU_COUNT("EKPO", "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_<%=language%>", "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_<%=language%>" = '<%=create_purchase_requisition_activity%>' )> 0
  THEN 'with PR' 
  ELSE 'without PR' 
END
